name: enqueue(_:postingStyle:coalesceMask:forModes:)
desc: Adds a notification to the notification queue with a specified posting style, criteria for coalescing, and run loop mode.
declaration:
func enqueue(_ notification: Notification, 
postingStyle: NotificationQueue.PostingStyle, 
coalesceMask: NotificationQueue.NotificationCoalescing, 
    forModes modes: [RunLoop.Mode]?)
